intro: Oxymitra unonifolia, commonly known as the slender oxymitra, is a flowering plant native to Southeast Asia. It is a member of the Rubiaceae family, which includes coffee and gardenias. The plant is characterized by its slender, climbing stems and small, opposite leaves. Its flowers are typically white or pale yellow and are borne in clusters. Oxymitra unonifolia is often found in moist, shaded environments such as forests and shrublands.
